content.rendered:
Directed by Guy Ritchie.

Written by Ivan Atkinson. Marn Davies. Guy Ritchie.

Cast Jake Gyllenhaal .Dar Salim .Sean Sagar

Languages English. Dari.

Producer Silvia Araez Guzman. Ivan Atkinson. Josh Berger. Siobhan Boyes. Olga Filipuk. Adam Fogelson. John Friedberg. Beau Harrington. Max Keene. Guy Ritchie. Carlos Ruiz Boceta. Robert Simonds. Samantha Waite.

Production Fresco Film Services. STX Films. Toff Guy Films.
